title: Zabbai
html: ZABBAI(Zabʹbai) [possibly a shortened form of Zebadiah, meaning “May Jehovah Endow”].A postexilic son of Bebai, among those who terminated their foreign marriage alliances, on Ezra’s counsel. (Ezr 10:28, 44) He was probably the father of the Baruch who did work on Jerusalem’s walls.—Ne 3:20.
